title: [Large-Scale] Technology-Enhanced Remote Collaborative Language Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital tool usage experience and basic understanding of language learning principles
context.additional_context: Emphasis on real-time collaborative activities with multicultural learners in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform at least three linguistic interaction scenarios (meetings, presentations, negotiations) using VR-based collaboration tools.
Learners apply self-correction strategies to reduce language errors by over 30% through digital feedback systems.
Learners can generate and utilize over five language expressions reflecting cultural contexts in remote collaboration environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
